title: Portfolio Website
description: A sleek, animated portfolio website showcasing my skills, projects, and experience with dark/light mode support.

details.brief: A sleek, animated personal portfolio showcasing my skills, projects, and experience with light/dark mode, responsive design, and modern animations using Framer Motion.
challenges: Making the design visually appealing for both light and dark mode.
Structuring reusable components for easy future updates.
futurePlans: Add a blog section to share development tips and experiences.
Implement multilingual support for wider audience reach.
Introduce backend analytics to track visitor engagement.

title: Employee Management System
description: A full-featured employee management app with role-based authentication, payroll, and workflow tracking.

details.brief: A role-based employee management app featuring authentication, payroll processing, and workflow tracking for organizations.
challenges: Implementing secure role-based authentication with Firebase.
Designing an intuitive interface for complex management tasks.
Handling dynamic data updates in real-time.
futurePlans: Build a mobile-friendly PWA version for on-the-go access.

title: LearnXYZ
description: An interactive learning platform for math, science, and tech courses with structured lessons and quizzes.

details.brief: An interactive course-selling platform offering math, science, and technology lessons with structured modules, quizzes, and payment integration.
challenges: Organizing and presenting large amounts of learning content clearly.
Implementing secure payment and course access controls.
Managing database structure for courses and users.
futurePlans: Add live class streaming and Q&A sessions.
Implement gamification features like badges and leaderboards.
Create a mobile app for easier learning on the go.

title: Hobby Hub
description: An event organizing site where users can create, discover, and participate in various hobbies and events.

details.brief: An event organizing platform where users can create, join, and explore various hobby-based activities.
challenges: Designing a payment flow with Stripe integration.
Managing user roles for event hosts and participants.
Making the platform engaging and easy to navigate.
futurePlans: Add event review and rating systems.
Introduce social features like group chats and community boards.
